Pyjamas Conf

Co-creator of the Pyjamas Conf.

24 hours streaming of talks about Python and connecting with Python communities around the world that you can access at home.

Full-day of workshops, talks, BoF sessions, sprints and any other activities organized by various Python communities.

Social:

  • GitHub
  • YouTube channel

2nd Edition: 2020 - International

1st Edition: 2019 - Brazil
